description: Place the link of a picture and the magic brain will tell you which celibrities appear, where, and the probabilities of being them
Place the link of a picture and the magic brain will tell you which colors appear, and an aproximated percentage of each one
Place the link of a picture and the magic brain will tell you the faces that appear and where
Place the link of a picture and the magic brain will tell you the ingredients and the probability of each of them
